import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; export class Header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { menus : [{pageName: "Home",path:"/", active:false, protected:false}, {pageName: "Login",path:"/login", active:false, protected:false}, {pageName: "Logout",path:"/logout", active:true, protected:false}, ], login: localStorage.getItem("token") ? true : false, }; this.logout = this.logout.bind(this); this.menuTemplate = (obj)=>{ return (
  • {obj.pageName}
    • ); } } logout() { localStorage.removeItem("token"); this.setState({ login: false }); } render() { return (
      {this.state.menus.map( (obj, index)=>{ this.menuTemplate(obj); })}
